entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, York Factory

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind becoming west 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature falling to minus 18 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 30 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 18 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 29 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 28 in the evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 20 January 2023
